_aChangeLog.text: changed platform to address bug in SourceMod NoBlock mod

_aLatestUpdates._sText: The platform in the map was based on a func_door which trapped players due to a bug in the SourceMod NoBlock mod.  This version uses a MoveLinear and avoids the problem.  The original works fine if you are not using the SourceMod NoBlock mod.

_sText: Destroy the operation of the Xenor Blaster and win the round.  There are 3 teleport rooms in the map so watch your backs!  This quakeish map also has some secrets, including a sub-tunnel.
